label: thm-asymptotic-std-dev-structural-continuity
name: Asymptotic Behavior of the Structural Continuity for the Regularized Standard Deviation

attributes_added.label: attr-asymptotic-std-dev-structural-continuity
attributes_added.expression: The structural continuity bound for the regularized standard deviation has an asymptotic behavior determined by the structural growth exponents of the swarm aggregation operator.
